lead_paragraph: Malakai Fekitoa, a 22-year-old from a remote island of Tonga, is making his first start this weekend in the storied uniform of rugby’s New Zealand All Blacks.
snippet: Malakai Fekitoa, a 22-year-old from a remote island of Tonga, is making his first start this weekend in the storied uniform of rugby’s New Zealand All Blacks.
